languages.text: В результате расследования ситуации было принято решение об уничтожении Идиры Тласс, предположительно являвшейся причиной варп-активности. Ситуация стабилизирована, однако свита Лорд-капитана утратила псайкера.
During the investigation of the situation, Idira Tlass, the alleged cause of the warp activity, was eliminated. The situation has stabilised, but the Lord Captain's retinue has lost a psyker.
languages.original_text: В результате расследования ситуации было принято решение об уничтожении Идиры Тласс, предположительно являвшейся причиной варп-активности. Ситуация стабилизирована, однако свита Лорд-капитана утратила псайкера.

traits.locale_text: During the investigation of the situation, Idira Tlass, the alleged cause of the warp activity, was eliminated. The situation has stabilised, but the Lord Captain's retinue has lost a psyker.
During the investigation of the situation, Idira Tlass, the alleged cause of the warp activity, was eliminated. The situation has stabilised, but the Lord Captain's retinue has lost a psyker.
During the investigation of the situation, Idira Tlass, the alleged cause of the warp activity, was eliminated. The situation has stabilised, but the Lord Captain's retinue has lost a psyker.

languages.text: 在调查情况的过程中，领主舰长推测伊迪拉·特拉斯就是这场亚空间事故的直接原因，并将其消灭。目前情况已经稳定下来，但领主舰长的随行人员中失去了一名灵能者。
languages.original_text: During the investigation of the situation, Idira Tlass, the alleged cause of the warp activity, was eliminated. The situation has stabilised, but the Lord Captain's retinue has lost a psyker.

traits.locale_text: 在调查情况的过程中，领主舰长推测伊迪拉·特拉斯就是这场亚空间事故的直接原因，并将其消灭。目前情况已经稳定下来，但领主舰长的随行人员中失去了一名灵能者。

languages.text: 状況調査の過程で、歪みの活動の原因とされるイディラ・トラスが排除された。状況は安定したが、ロード・キャプテンの従者は従者は異能者を失った。
languages.original_text: During the investigation of the situation, Idira Tlass, the alleged cause of the warp activity, was eliminated. The situation has stabilised, but the Lord Captain's retinue has lost a psyker.

traits.locale_text: 状況調査の過程で、歪みの活動の原因とされるイディラ・トラスが排除された。状況は安定したが、ロード・キャプテンの従者は従者は異能者を失った。

languages.text: Durante la investigación se ha eliminado a Idira Tlass, presunta causante de la actividad de disformidad. La situación se ha estabilizado, pero {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán tiene una psíquica menos en su séquito.
languages.original_text: During the investigation of the situation, Idira Tlass, the alleged cause of the warp activity, was eliminated. The situation has stabilised, but the Lord Captain's retinue has lost a psyker.

traits.locale_text: Durante la investigación se ha eliminado a Idira Tlass, presunta causante de la actividad de disformidad. La situación se ha estabilizado, pero {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán tiene una psíquica menos en su séquito.

languages.text: Im Zuge der Untersuchung der Situation wurde Idira Tlass, die mutmaßliche Urheberin der Warpaktivität, eliminiert. Die Lage hat sich stabilisiert, aber die Entourage des Lord Captains hat eine Psionikerin verloren.
languages.original_text: During the investigation of the situation, Idira Tlass, the alleged cause of the warp activity, was eliminated. The situation has stabilised, but the Lord Captain's retinue has lost a psyker.

traits.locale_text: Im Zuge der Untersuchung der Situation wurde Idira Tlass, die mutmaßliche Urheberin der Warpaktivität, eliminiert. Die Lage hat sich stabilisiert, aber die Entourage des Lord Captains hat eine Psionikerin verloren.

languages.text: Au cours de l'enquête, Idira Tlass, la cause présumée de l'activité du Warp, a été éliminée. La situation s'est stabilisée, mais {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a perdu une psyker.
languages.original_text: During the investigation of the situation, Idira Tlass, the alleged cause of the warp activity, was eliminated. The situation has stabilised, but the Lord Captain's retinue has lost a psyker.

traits.locale_text: Au cours de l'enquête, Idira Tlass, la cause présumée de l'activité du Warp, a été éliminée. La situation s'est stabilisée, mais {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a perdu une psyker.

languages.text: Durumun incelenmesi sırasında öteboyut faaliyetlerinin sebebi olduğu düşünülen İdira Tlass ortadan kaldırıldı. Durum kontrol altına alınırken Lord Kaptan'ın maiyeti de bir ruhsezer kaybetmiş oldu.
languages.original_text: During the investigation of the situation, Idira Tlass, the alleged cause of the warp activity, was eliminated. The situation has stabilised, but the Lord Captain's retinue has lost a psyker.
